name: gymcore
description: Sistema de gestiÃ³n integral para gimnasios con arquitectura de microservicios

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm dev:gateway" "pnpm dev:auth" "pnpm dev:gyms" "pnpm dev:payments" "pnpm dev:frontend"
scripts.db:generate:auth: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/auth-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:gym: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/gym-management-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:inventory: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/inventory-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:payment: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/payment-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:all: pnpm db:generate:auth && pnpm db:generate:gym && pnpm db:generate:inventory && pnpm db:generate:payment
scripts.db:migrate:auth: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/auth-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:gym: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/gym-management-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:inventory: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/inventory-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:payment: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/payment-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:auth: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/auth-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:gym: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/gym-management-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:inventory: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/inventory-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:payment: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/payment-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:auth: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/auth-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:gym: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/gym-management-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:inventory: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/inventory-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:payment: pnpm exec dotenv -e ./backend/apps/payment-service/.env -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.clean:deps: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules

author: Tu Nombre
